channel.title: Calcutta HC on Internet Freedom Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Calcutta HC on Internet Freedom Foundation

item.title: Calcutta HC stays internet shutdown issued by West Bengal Government
item.description: Calcutta HC has stayed an internet shutdown order dated 03.03.2022 issued by the State of West Bengal. The HC was of the view that the order was not issued by a competent authority. The order was stayed in a petition filed by Ashlesh Biradar. IFF provided legal support.
